titleStmt.title: Lettre dy [sic] roy d'Angleterre, a madame la princesse de Condé
titleStmt.author: James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Vostre tres-affectionné cousin, Iacques Roi. De nostre Palais de VVestmister le 3 Ianvier 1617.
Place of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"A reply to a letter respecting the imprisonment of the prince de Conde"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
